events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has a noticeable scratch on the surface and does not look new at all.
The case has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the reported scratch and damage on the item.
A support agent has been assigned to your case to assist you with the product defect issue you reported.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that your product arrived with a scratch. I'm here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us some photos of the scratched area and confirm if the packaging was damaged upon arrival?
I've attached the photos you requested. The box looks intact, but the scratch on the product is clearly visible in the images.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement product or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, as I still want to use the product. Please proceed with sending a new item.
We have processed your replacement request and shipped a new product which should arrive within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and are satisfied with it.
Yes, I got the replacement today and it is in perfect condition. Thanks for the prompt support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. We will now close your support case. Thank you for contacting us.
